name: Ronnie
greetingText: You are awesome, creative, beautiful and upm everyday!
wishText: May you keep reciting your poems and keep explaining this silly all the things ;)
textInChatBox: Happy birthday to you!! Yayyayayay! You are the best blah...
text2: That's what I was going to do.
text4: I realised, I wanted to do something
outroText: Okay, now enjoy your day, and make it the best while sliding to the new decade :]
replayText: Or click, if you want to watch it again, be eepy!
